# Default Activity Feed Factory

```jsx
const DefaultActivityFeedFactory = (props) => {

	const {id, component = ActivityFeed, _links, children, ...otherProps} = props;

	const defaultSorting = [{column: "eventDate", direction: "DESC"}];

	const ComposedActivityFeed = R.compose(
		withActivityFeedConfigLoader,
		withListQueryLoader(_links, defaultSorting),
		withActivityFeedActions,
		withActivityFeedQuickSearch
	)(component);

	return (
		<ComposedActivityFeed {...otherProps} id={id} _links={_links}>
			{children}
		</ComposedActivityFeed>
	);
};
```
